author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Beyondspring Qtrly Loss Per Share $0.68
text:
April 3 (Reuters) - BeyondSpring Inc:
* PROVIDES OPERATIONAL UPDATE AND FOURTH-QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE $0.68 * CASH AND CASH EQUIVALENTS WERE $30.6 MILLION AT DEC. 31, 2017, COMPARED TO $40.7 MILLION AT SEPT. 30, 2017
* BELIEVES HAS SUFFICIENT CASH RESOURCES TO ADVANCE ONGOING CLINICAL TRIALS IN LATE 2018 OR EARLY 2019 AND FIRST HALF OF 2019 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
